description: Keep your computer awake! Forbid your computer to activate sceensaver, turn off the screen or suspend when it is idle for a while. Click the indicator icon (in the taskbar) once to keep your computer awake for the session. Click again to enable persistance of this setting between restarts (indicated by a small lock icon on the indicator). Switch off by clicking again.
name: Keep awake!
